forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
In the gentle embrace of the night, Downtown San Francisco rests under a blanket of partly cloudy skies, revealing a tranquil low of 47. As dawn approaches, a west-northwest breeze whispers softly, setting a serene tone for the day ahead. With Friday unfurling its wings, expect a transformation into mostly sunny vistas with temperatures gracefully hovering near 60. As the afternoon unfolds, a coolness will delicately descend, bringing the mercury to about 58 degrees, a reminder of the city’s famed microclimates.

The air is clear but tinged with the remnants of the marine layer, hinting at the fog that often dances through the Golden Gate. Perched in this urban landscape, one might consider stepping outside, dressed in light layers, perhaps a soft sweater paired with a windbreaker to counter the gentle breeze. A stroll along the waterfront or a quiet visit to a local café would be well-suited to the day’s character, allowing one to savor the city’s unique charm without the throng of tourists. Engage with the surroundings, perhaps indulging in a leisurely read, as each moment offers a fleeting glimpse into the captivating yet understated beauty of San Francisco.
